snippet.title: Steredenn - Trailer (Steam, PS4, Xbox One, iPhone & iPad)
snippet.description:
Steredenn is an endless chaotic space shooter for Steam (PC/Mac/Linux), PS4, Xbox One and iPhone/iPad.

Mix a shmup and a roguelike together for a pure blast of fun and action!

Out now on:

- Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/347160
- iPhone/iPad: https://itunes.apple.com/app/steredenn/id916957220
- And your PS4 or Xbox One… :)

Prepare your keyboards and gamepads for the upcoming bulletstorm!

---

More info at http://steredenn.pixelnest.io/
